item.article: Possessive pronouns and adjectives and reflexive pronouns

item.c: Canada has three northern territories which ___ have a capital: Northwest Territories (Yellowknife), Yukon Territory (Whitehorse), and Nunavut (Iqualuit).
The next participant in this village drama is the weather, which ......... a very significant part in English life.
The Copperhead is a venomous serpent, found as far North as the Blue Hills in Massachusetts and ___ bite has proved dangerous to hikers and joggers.
item.article: Possessive pronouns and adjectives and reflexive pronouns
